channel.title: The Fabelmans on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in The Fabelmans on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Millie Bobby Brown, Gabriel LaBelle to Star in Netflix Romantic Comedy ‘Just Picture It’ (Exclusive)
item.description: Lee Toland Krieger, known for helming the drama ‘The Age of Adaline’ and episodes of Netflix’s hit ‘You,’ is directing the feature.
